p.1: 6-12 month contract position for a Data Scientist with 3-5+ programming languages, databases, version control, statistics, or machine learning required. SQL and noSQL databases experience.
p.5: Perform tasks required to implement predictive modeling features as software, including building artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning (ML), and statistical models; packaging, deploying, integrating, and supporting AI/ML models; and building platforms and processes to facilitate the development of AI/ML models by others.
p.8: Bachelor=E2=80=99s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Math, Physics, or similar quantitative field or equivalent experience. 5+ years of related experience required. Software engineering proficiency in 2+ programming languages, databases, version control, statistics, or machine learning required.
p.10: Preferred experience: SQL and noSQL databases, writing and consuming APIs, application containers (e.g. Docker), streaming data, building predictive models, compute clouds, creating database schemas, Linux administration, continuous integration/continuous deployment.

li: Writes software code to enable and automate ML/AI model training and deployment
li.1: Builds ML/AI models using common methods in Python
li.2: Deploys predictive models using established software patterns
li.3: Writes code to extract data from variety of databases and data sources
li.4: Writes reusable code libraries for use by other machine learning engineers
li.5: Trains data scientists and machine learning engineers in best practices
li.6: Investigates and adapts new software platforms for ML/AI and data engineering

p.12: What previous job titles or background work will in this role?

li: Data Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, Machine Learning Researcher, Artificial Intelligence Researcher, Artificial Intelligence Engineer,
